description: This is a shell script used for comparing sstate checksum data between different MACHINE configurations in Yocto-based embedded Linux build environments. The script manages temporary directories, executes bitbake commands, gathers sigdata files, and performs diff comparisons of signature files across different MACHINEs and build tasks.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays help information about script usage and options.

methods.name: echo_error
methods.description: Outputs an error message to stderr and terminates execution.

methods.name: compareSignatures
methods.description: Compares signature files for specified tasks between two MACHINEs, generating logs and identifying differences.

methods.name: compareMachines
methods.description: Performs comparison between multiple MACHINEs by invoking compareSignatures appropriately.
